ThingDef.label: Apple
ThingDef.description: Apple fruit with a fairly long shelf life.

ThingDef.label: Banana
ThingDef.description: Banana palm fruit with excellent taste and short shelf life.

ThingDef.label: Orange
ThingDef.description: A citrus fruit harvested from an orange tree. Has a characteristic taste.

ThingDef.label: Olive
ThingDef.description: A citrus fruit harvested from an orange tree. Has a characteristic taste.

ThingDef.label: Peach
ThingDef.description: Fruits that contain a lot of sugar. Delicate and tasteful.

ThingDef.label: Grapes
ThingDef.description: Delicious and juicy fruits that can be used to make wine.

HediffDef.label: rosehip impact
HediffDef.description: Impact of rosehips on the immune system.

ThingDef.label: Dionius
ThingDef.description: Desert plant with external rhizome. It has a calming effect, which potentially helps in the fight against drug addiction.

ThingDef.label: Cardium
ThingDef.description: Swamp plant with a strong stem. The use in the form of soup causes a beneficial effect on the hematopoietic and circulatory system. The patient tolerates blood loss more easily, and the symptoms of heart disease sometimes cease to bother him at all.

ThingDef.label: Rhinocarpus
ThingDef.description: A rather tasty and vitamin-rich plant that grows in the jungle. Rhinos often eat the fruit, from which the plant got its name.

ThingDef.label: Lemon
ThingDef.description: Vitamin-rich fruit of the lemon tree

ThingDef.label: Cactus fruit
ThingDef.description: Raw and sour cactus fruit. Terrible taste, but is it better than nothing?
